description: In Windows, your CIV5MAP files will be located in one of the following directories: My Documents\​My Games\​Sid Meier's Civilization V\​Maps or C:\​Program Files (x86)\​Steam\​SteamApps\​Common\​Sid Meier's Civilization V\​Assets\​Maps
On a Mac, your CIV5Map file will be located in the following directory: ~/​Library/​Application Support/​Sid Meier's Civilization 5/​Maps
